channel.title: ProxySQL Quickstart on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: Load Balance MySQL Group Replication Using ProxySQL
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Load Balance MySQL Group Replication Using ProxySQL ProxySQL supports load balancing for MySQL Group Replication. This guide will show you how you can load balance MySQL Group Replication using ProxySQL. Before You Begin Before proceeding: Read mysql group replication concept to learn about MySQL Group Replication.
